TopicTitle: render queue bug causing beautiful rainbow effect + no key to switch to Kerbal's first perspective view (yet?)

Articles.Content: I've looked through Input config page in options to find only [TAB] mouselook toggle and [V] change camera... was that [C] or [V] in KSP1 that toggled between "cockpit view" and "outside view"? Eventually, by repeatedly pressing [V] i've got to this beautiful rainbow rendition of again incorrect render queue settings for shaders used:
Damn you've got so many bugs/glitches
